data.lyric:
[ti:Home Sweet]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Home Sweet]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Home Sweet - Russell Dickerson
[00:04.41]Home sweet
[00:08.75]Touching down from a six night honeymoon
[00:12.30]Sun kissed kids still drunk on love
[00:15.56]Went from all-inclusive margaritas in Malibu
[00:20.33]To praying we could pay rent this month
[00:25.76]That doormat says welcome home
[00:29.59]But I think it's wherever I'm with you
[00:33.75]It's more than some bricks and stones
[00:37.66]No there ain't nothing like
[00:40.07]Home sweet you and me
[00:43.72]Ain't got much but we got all we need
[00:47.43]Wherever the wind blows
[00:49.53]Wherever this life goes
[00:51.63]Baby all I know ain't nothing like nothing like
[00:55.88]Home sweet
[00:59.71]You and me
[01:04.01]Your love is like a porch swing on Sunday
[01:08.05]Just as gentle as a Summer sunrise
[01:11.43]They say it's where the heart is well mine's with you babe
[01:15.89]Long as I got your hand I'm fine yeah
[01:21.32]Could be white brick and picket fences
[01:25.04]Or some busted AC hotel room
[01:29.31]It's all picture perfect if you're in it
[01:32.69]No it don't get much better than
[01:35.59]Home sweet you and me
[01:39.14]Ain't got much but we got all we need
[01:43.05]Wherever the wind blows
[01:45.08]Wherever this life goes
[01:47.16]Baby all I know ain't nothing like nothing like
[01:51.44]Home sweet nothing like nothing like
[01:55.28]You and me nothing like nothing like
[01:59.28]Home sweet nothing like nothing like
[02:03.16]You and me nothing like nothing like
[02:07.93]A quarter acre and a two-bed farmhouse
[02:11.28]Polaroid kiss with the red sold sign
[02:15.48]Sitting on boxes in the living room laughing and crying
[02:19.78]Just staring at them two pink lines huh
[02:26.05]Ooh yeah
[02:28.64]Time to make a little more room in our
[02:31.22]Home sweet you and me
[02:34.78]Yeah we got it all and you're still all I need
[02:38.64]Wherever the wind blows
[02:40.63]Wherever this life goes
[02:42.66]Baby all I know ain't nothing like nothing like
[02:46.80]Home sweet nothing like nothing like
[02:50.77]You and me nothing like nothing like
[02:54.90]Home sweet nothing like nothing like
[02:58.72]You and me yeah nothing like nothing like
[03:04.96]Nothing like nothing like
[03:06.81]You and me
[03:08.63]Nothing like nothing like
data.trans:
[ti:Home Sweet]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Home Sweet]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:04.41]温暖的家
[00:08.75]结束六晚的蜜月旅行
[00:12.30]阳光亲吻孩子依然沉醉在爱里
[00:15.56]从马里布的玛格丽塔酒一杯接一杯
[00:20.33]祈祷这个月我们可以交房租
[00:25.76]门垫上写着欢迎回家
[00:29.59]但我觉得只要我和你在一起我就能开心起来
[00:33.75]这不仅仅是一堆石头
[00:37.66]没有什么比得上
[00:40.07]甜蜜的家你和我
[00:43.72]我们拥有的不多但我们拥有需要的一切
[00:47.43]不管风在哪里吹
[00:49.53]不管人生何去何从
[00:51.63]宝贝我只知道这无与伦比
[00:55.88]温暖的家
[00:59.71]你和我
[01:04.01]你的爱就像周日门廊上的秋千
[01:08.05]就像夏日的日出一样温和
[01:11.43]他们说我的心与你同在宝贝
[01:15.89]只要牵着你的手我就安然无恙
[01:21.32]可能是白色的砖头和尖栅栏
[01:25.04]或是某间破旧的空调酒店房间
[01:29.31]如果你置身其中一切都完美无瑕
[01:32.69]没有比这更好的了
[01:35.59]甜蜜的家你和我
[01:39.14]我们拥有的不多但我们拥有需要的一切
[01:43.05]不管风在哪里吹
[01:45.08]不管人生何去何从
[01:47.16]宝贝我只知道这无与伦比
[01:51.44]温暖的家无与伦比
[01:55.28]你和我完全不同
[01:59.28]温暖的家无与伦比
[02:03.16]你和我完全不同
[02:07.93]四分之一英亩大一栋有两张床的农舍
[02:11.28]宝丽来亲吻红色已售商品
[02:15.48]坐在客厅的箱子上笑着哭着
[02:19.78]凝望着那两条粉色的线
[02:26.05]//
[02:28.64]是时候给我们的世界多留一点空间了
[02:31.22]甜蜜的家你和我
[02:34.78]我们拥有一切你依然是我需要的全部
[02:38.64]不管风在哪里吹
[02:40.63]不管人生何去何从
[02:42.66]宝贝我只知道这无与伦比
[02:46.80]温暖的家无与伦比
[02:50.77]你和我完全不同
[02:54.90]温暖的家无与伦比
[02:58.72]你和我无与伦比
[03:04.96]无可比拟
[03:06.81]你和我
[03:08.63]无可比拟
